Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires the testing of baby food for toxic heavy metals and the disclosure of such test results
Summary: Enacts the "Baby Food Safety and Transparency Act"; requires the testing of baby food for toxic heavy metals and the disclosure of such test results.
LawCode: Add ยง214-p, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring the testing of baby food for toxic heavy metals and the disclosure of such test results
